question: Can I sweep my house after Maghrib,and cut hairs and nails. As I read at Faizul Uloom, Hyderabad, notice borad, that it brings, Iflass.
answer:
QUESTION
I do not remember the exact wordings but it was clear to me that it was not recommended, in nights to do the listed above. Kindly advise me.
ANSWER


Share:
It is correct to sweep, cut hair and nails after Maghrib Salaat.

We have not come across any authentic source of prohibition.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best
